timeline.bodyText: PluginDefineNotFoundException should be changed to PluginDefinitionNotFoundException
timeline.author: terrymanu

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/shardingsphere-agent/shardingsphere-agent-core/src/main/java/org/apache/shardingsphere/agent/core/exception/PluginDefineNotFoundException.java b/shardingsphere-agent/shardingsphere-agent-core/src/main/java/org/apache/shardingsphere/agent/core/exception/PluginDefinitionNotFoundException.java
similarity index 84%
rename from shardingsphere-agent/shardingsphere-agent-core/src/main/java/org/apache/shardingsphere/agent/core/exception/PluginDefineNotFoundException.java
rename to shardingsphere-agent/shardingsphere-agent-core/src/main/java/org/apache/shardingsphere/agent/core/exception/PluginDefinitionNotFoundException.java
index 9b33568d5f..8ce3639212 100644
--- a/shardingsphere-agent/shardingsphere-agent-core/src/main/java/org/apache/shardingsphere/agent/core/exception/PluginDefineNotFoundException.java
+++ b/shardingsphere-agent/shardingsphere-agent-core/src/main/java/org/apache/shardingsphere/agent/core/exception/PluginDefinitionNotFoundException.java

@@ -19,9 +19,9 @@
 package org.apache.shardingsphere.agent.core.exception;
 
 /**
- * Plugin define not found exception.
+ * Plugin definition not found exception.
  */
-public class PluginDefineNotFoundException extends RuntimeException {
+public class PluginDefinitionNotFoundException extends RuntimeException {
     
     /**
      * Constructs an exception with formatted error message and arguments.

      * @param typeDescription TypeDescription

+     * @return the plugin definition configurations

     public PluginAdviceDefine loadPluginAdviceDefine(final TypeDescription typeDescription) {
         return pluginDefineMap.getOrDefault(typeDescription.getTypeName(), PluginAdviceDefine.createDefault());
